Class Sedan

java.lang.Object
com.gradescope.datastructures.Vehicle
com.gradescope.datastructures.Sedan
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Vehicle>
public class Sedan extends Vehicle
Represents a Sedan vehicle.

A Sedan is a type of MotorVehicle that includes a seating capacity attribute and specific horsepower constraints.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a Sedan with the specified attributes.

  • Constructor Details

    • Sedan

      public Sedan(double price, int hp, double miles, double zts, int seats, String color)
      Constructs a Sedan with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      price - the vehicle price (validated in Vehicle)
      hp - the horsepower (must be 200, 400, or 600)
      miles - the vehicle mileage (validated in Vehicle)
      zts - the 0–60 mph time in seconds (validated in MotorVehicle)
      seats - the seating capacity (must be between 1 and 8 inclusive)
      color - the vehicle color
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if horsepower or seating capacity is invalid

  • Method Details

    • setHorsepower

      public void setHorsepower(int hp)
      Sets the horsepower for the sedan.

      Valid horsepower values are 200, 400, or 600.

      Specified by:
      setHorsepower in class Vehicle
      Parameters:
      hp - the horsepower value
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if hp is invalid

    • setSeatingCapacity

      public void setSeatingCapacity(int seats)
      Sets the seating capacity.
      Parameters:
      seats - number of seats (must be between 1 and 8 inclusive)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if seats is outside valid range

    • setZeroToSixty

      public void setZeroToSixty(double time)
      Sets the 0–60 mph acceleration time after validation.
      Parameters:
      time - acceleration time in seconds (must be between 1 and 10 inclusive)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if time is outside valid range
